name: Robotics Lab - prologue
description:
hello, my name isn't actually dimanari.

I'm not a beginner in coding, but pretty fresh to game development.

the Game Engine used in this game is some c++ code using DirectX I wrote over the past few years, I replaced most of it not too long ago due to changing from the old DX code to a more current version.

the game:

You are bound in a box,
with others almost like you.
you all need is to stay awake, but batteries drain fast.
you can kill your peers and hope they drop a battery charge or even a solar panel!
but so can the others do to you.

difficulty guide:
easy - everyone else is stupid except me.  AI units never collect charges repairs or extra modules.
hard - no more playing dumb. every single AI units will collect charges and repairs as fast as they can, leaving nothing behind. you can't scavenge off idiots anymore!
